query:
WITH
                dummy as (SELECT 1)
                
                
                
                    , season_filter as (
                        SELECT
                            distinct(recipe_id) as id
                        FROM
                            recipes_seasons
                        WHERE season_id = any($1)
                    )
                
                
                    , tag_filter as (
                        SELECT
                            recipe_id as id,
                            count(*) as rank
                        FROM
                            recipes_tags
                        WHERE tag_id = any($2)
                        GROUP BY id
                    )
                
                
                
                    , ingredient_filter as (
                        SELECT
                            recipe_id as id,
                            count(*) as rank
                        FROM
                            recipes_ingredients
                        WHERE ingredient_id = any($3)
                        GROUP BY id
                    )
                
                
                    , account_filter as (
                        SELECT
                            distinct(id)
                        FROM
                            recipes
                        WHERE author_id = $4
                    )
                
            SELECT
                r.id,
                r.name,
                r.image,
                is_recipe_in_account_favs(r.id, $4) as "is_favorite!",
                r.ingredients as "ingredients: Vec<QIngredient>",
                r.diets as "diets: Vec<Diet>",
                n_shares,
                is_private,
                count(*) OVER() AS "total_count!"
            FROM recipes_full AS r
                
                
                 INNER JOIN season_filter USING (id)
                 INNER JOIN tag_filter as tf USING (id)
                
                 INNER JOIN ingredient_filter as if USING (id)
                 INNER JOIN account_filter USING (id)
            WHERE
                is_private = 'f' OR author_id = $4
            ORDER BY
                
                 if.rank DESC, 
                tf.rank DESC, 
                (extract(epoch from publication_date)+id)::bigint % $5
            OFFSET $6
            LIMIT $7
